title: TheTruth
description:
From their website: 
 	

The Truth is an outrageous murder-mystery for the &#039;Me Generation&#039;. Seven strangers go to a remote retreat for a week of soul searching. Encouraged to tell the truth at all times by their guru Donna Shuck, they venture on a spiritual journey of personal growth, taking in jealousy, hatred, sex, perversion and a little murder on the way.
